body: C. Custer from ChinaGeek translates and analyses a subversive New Years' video card, "Little Rabbit, Be Good!". The video addresses most of the social conflicts happened in the past few years, such as poisonous milk, forced demolition, and etc.

sentence: C. Custer from ChinaGeek translates and analyses a subversive New Years' video card, "Little Rabbit, Be Good!".
The video addresses most of the social conflicts happened in the past few years, such as poisonous milk, forced demolition, and etc.
